name: Spaceman Spiff's Space eScapade
description:
This project was created by the students of YesSchool and it's Mechatroni.ca program - a program for kids focused on teaching Stem subjects including robotics and programming. For GMTK Game Jam, two of our brightest minds, Andrey N, 12,  and Alex S, 10, under the supervision of their teacher David have created and submitted this game! The game is created in Scratch, a visual block-based programming language that is perfect for teaching young students the basics of coding, but is versatile enough to allow them to create games such as this one! (Find out more about YesSchool and Mechatroni.ca on our site, https://www.mechatroni.ca/ )!

Scratch Link:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/411164469/embed/
